title: Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck keep it cozy casual out separately in Los Angeles
text:
Friendly exes Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck both looked cozy casual when they were seen out separately in Los Angeles this Wednesday.

Ben, 47, threw a navy hoodie over a powder blue tee and rounded off the look with sneakers and a pair of Nike sweats.

Meanwhile, Jennifer, also 47, wore a charcoal sweater with a broken heart on it and carried a ceramic coffee cup out onto the sidewalk.

She swept her dark hair back into a ponytail and accented her slender legs with a pair of skintight and stylishly faded jeans.

Jennifer had been glimpsed the previous day wearing an elegant cream sweatshirt with a knee-length black skirt and leather flats.

She accessorized with a large black leather handbag and her sunglasses for her sidewalk stroll through the tony Brentwood area of LA.

On Tuesday night, Ben was spotted out to dinner at celeb hot spot Giorgio Baldi with his friend Laurene Powell Jobs, the widow of Steve Jobs.

Jennifer and her Argo director ex-husband have three children - 13-year-old Violet, 10-year-old Seraphina and seven-year-old Samuel.

The couple married in 2005, separated in 2015 and took so long to get divorced that there were rumors they would reunite.

Ben, who has been to rehab multiple times, underwent another stint there in the second half of last year, reportedly at Jennifer's urging.
